claim_summary: Act 788 of 2025 §5 appropriates federal block grants to the Division of County Operations, including $57,200,764 for the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) Block Grant, $13,943,475 for the Community Services Block Grant, and $5,378,754 for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program administrative funds.

source.title: Act 788 of 2025 – Division of County Operations Appropriation (Section 5)
